name: Viking Brothers (itch)
description:
Mord and Hefn are two viking brothers whose parents died by the sword conquering English Land.

With the only axe, the only shield, and the very only boat their family has left, they travel to the English shores to avenge their parents. To survive they will have to pass each other their axe and shield depending on their necesities.

Battle through hordes of not-so-well armored knights and put an let your parents' spirit reach the Valhalla, offer the blood of your enemies to Odin to improve your skills and and let your parents' spirit reach the Valhalla.

Viking Brothers is the winner of the first ESNE Game Jam, which took place in a university in Spain.
